examples.example: 我们不要总是抱怨，而要积极面对生活中的困难。

translate.english: We should not always complain, but face the difficulties in life positively.

examples.example: 我们不要浪费时间，而要充分利用每一分每一秒去提升自己。

translate.english: We should not waste time, but make full use of every minute and every second to improve ourselves.

examples.example: 我们不要害怕失败，而要勇敢地去尝试和探索新的领域。

translate.english: We should not be afraid of failure, but bravely try and explore new fields.
